org.safs.net

Class NetUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.safs.net.NetUtilities

  • public class NetUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for network.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ARG_TEST_HOSTS
      "-testhosts" followed by a series of hostname separated by semi-colon, such as "-testhosts host1;host2;host3;host4"
      static java.lang.String LOCAL_HOST
      'localhost'
      static java.lang.String LOCAL_HOST_IP
      '127.0.0.1'
      static java.lang.String LOCAL_HOST_IPV6_PREFIX_1
      '::1'
      static java.lang.String LOCAL_HOST_IPV6_PREFIX_FE80
      'fe80::'
      static java.lang.String PATTERN_MAC_ADDRESS
      "^([0-9A-F]{2}[:-]){5}([0-9A-F]{2})$" the regex pattern for a MAC address.

      Test some implementations of this class.
      To test isLocalHost(String) and getHostIP(String), call as following:
      org.safs.net.NetUtilities -testhosts host1;host2;host3;host4

    • Method Detail

      • isLocalHost

        public static boolean isLocalHost(java.lang.String host)
        Test if the host is local according to the host's name.
        Parameters:
        host - String, the name/ip of the host
        Returns:
        boolean true if the host is local.

      • isMacAddress

        public static boolean isMacAddress(java.lang.String address)
        Parameters:
        address - String, the address to be tested
        Returns:
        boolean true if address is a MAC address

      • getHostIP

        public static java.lang.String getHostIP(java.lang.String hostname)
        Get the host's IP address.
        Parameters:
        hostname - String, the name of a host
        Returns:
        String, the host's IP address.

      • getLocalHostIP

        public static java.lang.String getLocalHostIP()
        Get the localhost's IP Address. Try Java's API to get it firstly, if it cannot be got the try command NativeWrapper.COMMAND_IPCONFIG.

      • getLocalHostName

        public static java.lang.String getLocalHostName()
        Returns:
        String, the name of localhost

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Test some implementations of this class.
        To test isLocalHost(String) and getHostIP(String), call as following:
        org.safs.net.NetUtilities -testhosts host1;host2;host3;host4
        Parameters:
        args - String[],
        -testhosts followed by a series of hostname separated by semi-colon, such as "-testhosts host1;host2;host3;host4", used to test method isLocalHost(String) and getHostIP(String)
        if IndependantLog.ARG_DEBUG followed by host name such as machine.domain.com, then #test_getHostIp(String[])
